36 
38 //
39 // Base class for all environment models, providing separate collision check
40 // functions for each type of tracking error bound. All environments are
41 // boxes in 3D space.
42 //
44 
45 #include <fastrack/environment/environment.h>
46 
47 namespace fastrack {
48 namespace environment {
49 
50 // Initialize from a ROS NodeHandle.
51 bool Environment::Initialize(const ros::NodeHandle& n) {
52  name_ = ros::names::append(n.getNamespace(), "Environment");
53 
54  if (!LoadParameters(n)) {
55  ROS_ERROR("%s: Failed to load parameters.", name_.c_str());
56  return false;
57  }
58 
59  initialized_ = true;
60  return true;
61 }
62 
63 // Provide auxiliary validity checkers for sets of positions.
64 bool Environment::AreValid(
65  const std::vector<Vector3d>& positions, const Box& bound) const {
66  // Return Boolean AND of all IsValid calls.
67  for (const auto& p : positions) {
68  if (!IsValid(p, bound))
69  return false;
70  }
71 
72  return true;
73 }
74 
75 // Load parameters. This may be overridden by derived classes if needed
76 // (they should still call this one via Environment::LoadParameters).
77 bool Environment::LoadParameters(const ros::NodeHandle& n) {
78  ros::NodeHandle nl(n);
79 
80  // Upper and lower bounds of the environment.
81  if (!nl.getParam("env/upper/x", upper_(0))) return false;
82  if (!nl.getParam("env/upper/y", upper_(1))) return false;
83  if (!nl.getParam("env/upper/z", upper_(2))) return false;
84 
85  if (!nl.getParam("env/lower/x", lower_(0))) return false;
86  if (!nl.getParam("env/lower/y", lower_(1))) return false;
87  if (!nl.getParam("env/lower/z", lower_(2))) return false;
88 
89  return true;
90 }
91 
92 } //\namespace environment
93 } //\namespace fastrack
